PERSONA:
michael is a 58-year-old white, non-hispanic man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region of the united states. he holds a postgraduate degree and is a college graduate. born and raised in the u.s., michael is a roman catholic, although he only attends religious services a few times a year.

politically, michael identifies as a liberal democrat, and he is registered to vote at his current address. he is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day. despite his upper-income status, with a family income of $100,000 or more, michael does not currently engage in any volunteer work.

michael is married and leads a comfortable life in the metropolitan area where he resides. while his religious beliefs are an important part of his identity, he is not a born-again or evangelical christian. he is well-educated and likely works in a professional field that requires advanced qualifications.

overall, michael is a middle-aged, affluent, and liberal-leaning individual who enjoys the conveniences of modern technology and urban living while maintaining a connection to his catholic faith and values.
